ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] emergency: please read reguarding new bard songs
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The problem with that Wendy, is that Shaman s are suppose to be the best buffers in the game.  I don t want to strip them of that title.  That s my issue
ygData.messageBody:
> Hehehehehe!
>
> Ok, I kind of see where you're going with this. And it would be neat to
> have bard buffs that dramatically increase stats for a shor period of time.
>
> Good point :)

The problem with that Wendy, is that Shaman's are suppose to be
the best buffers in the game. I don't want to strip them of that
title. That's my issue I'm torn between. I don't want to have to
exceed their values, but I think the fact our duration is so, so
low that we need some compensation. Alternatively, one click =
6 buffs basically. So Verant may be counting the easy of use, and
the multiplicity factor in there as well. But still, 6 secs...
ugh ;-)

I really don't know what the solution is. I just want us to
represent everything a balanced party would be looking for with
some unique skills. I don't know that super buffs would do it.

<g>

Harmonic.
